title: IView.GetOrientationName
description: Gets the predefined name of this view.
returns: Predefined name of view or an empty string for unnamed views
remarks: This method returns the orientation (predefined) name of the view; e.g., *Front, *Top, *Isometric, or a user-defined view name defined in the model. This method returns an empty string ("") for section views, detail views, projected views, and unfolded views.
